did.unittitle: KFAR Truman Project - Truman Village in Israel [Kfar-translated 'Village'] - Dinner, 22 February 1951 - Keren Kayemeth L'Israel or Forestry Agency of the Government of Israel - Jewish National Fund (JNF) - Background Information, 2 Pages; Brochure "KFAR Truman"; M.
